title: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna: Shin'en no Fairy
synopsis: Just when everything seems peaceful again for Yuna and her friends, a new enemy appears in the form of three robotic sisters. Yuna must once again become the Savior of Light to fight this strong, new evil.
related_anime: ['Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna: Kanashimi no Siren']
